products.description: A unified CRM that centralizes contacts, deals, and activity to give teams a single customer view. Helps sales, marketing, and service teams coordinate outreach and handoffs. Reduces data fragmentation and speeds deal cycles with shared customer context.

Marketing automation and lead management for attracting and converting prospects across channels. Helps marketing teams run campaigns, nurture leads, and measure ROI. Accelerates pipeline creation and improves lead-to-customer conversion rates.

Tools to manage pipelines, automate outreach, and coach reps to close deals faster. Helps sales teams prioritize leads, track performance, and eliminate manual tasks. Increases rep productivity and shortens sales cycles with workflow automation.

Customer service platform for ticketing, knowledge base, and customer feedback. Helps support teams resolve issues faster and deliver consistent experiences. Boosts retention and NPS by streamlining case resolution and proactive service.

A CMS and content management suite for creating, hosting, and optimizing website content. Helps marketers and content teams publish faster and personalize site experiences. Improves SEO, engagement, and lead capture with integrated analytics.

A centralized data platform that unifies customer data and analytics for better decision-making. Helps operations and analytics teams clean, connect, and activate data across tools. Drives 360° reporting, reduces manual reconciliation, and speeds insights.

Ecommerce tools to manage storefronts, product catalogs, and orders integrated with customer data. Helps digital commerce teams streamline online buying experiences. Increases conversion and lifetime value by connecting commerce data to marketing and service.

AI-powered assistant suite that speeds content creation, summaries, and automation in HubSpot workflows. Helps marketers, sellers, and support agents produce more high-quality output in less time. Cuts content production time and improves personalization with AI-driven suggestions.

personas.company_type: Mid-market SaaS vendors selling B2B platforms
personas.description: Sales orgs with 50-200 sales staff. Typical deal size $100K-$500K annually. Sales cycle 3-6 months. Buying decisions involve 4-6 stakeholders across revenue and operations.

personas.company_type: Small to mid ecommerce brands operating DTC or marketplace channels
personas.description: Marketing teams of 10-50 staff supporting online stores. Deal size $20K-$150K annually. Sales/marketing procurement cycles 1-3 months. Stakeholder groups 2-4 people including commerce and marketing leads.

personas.company_type: Large retail chains and omnichannel brands
personas.description: Customer support organizations with 200-600 agents. Deal size $300K-$1.5M annually. Procurement and implementation sales cycles 6-12 months. Typical stakeholder count 6-9 across service, ops, and IT.

personas.company_type: Mid-size healthcare providers and medical groups
personas.description: Revenue cycle teams of 50-200 staff. Deal size $150K-$700K annually. Sales cycle 4-9 months with regulatory reviews. Decision making involves 4-7 stakeholders across finance, ops, and clinical leadership.

personas.company_type: Early-stage companies focusing on rapid growth
personas.description: Small growth teams with 2-10 marketing staff. Typical deal size $12K-$60K annually. Short sales cycles of 1-2 months. Buying decisions involve 1-3 stakeholders, usually head of growth and founder/CMO.

mappings.pain_point: Sales reps spend hours on manual CRM updates and fragmented data, losing selling time and accuracy.
mappings.value_proposition: Smart CRM centralizes contacts and deals, reducing manual entry by up to 60% and freeing reps to sell ~8-12 extra hours per month.

mappings.pain_point: Forecasts are unreliable because pipeline data lives across spreadsheets and ad hoc tools.
mappings.value_proposition: Sales Hub brings automated pipeline tracking and forecasting, improving forecast accuracy by up to 30% and shortening decision cycles by weeks.

mappings.pain_point: Marketing and sales lack a shared view of leads, causing handoff drop-offs and wasted MQLs.
mappings.value_proposition: Marketing Hub integrated with Smart CRM creates a single lead lifecycle, increasing lead-to-opportunity conversion by 20-40%.

mappings.pain_point: Revenue operations can't quickly answer cross-channel performance questions due to siloed data.
mappings.value_proposition: Data Hub unifies customer and campaign data for cross-functional reporting, reducing report generation time by 70% and enabling faster strategic moves.

mappings.pain_point: Onboarding new reps is slow without centralized coaching resources and conversation records.
mappings.value_proposition: Sales Hub’s activity tracking and centralized playbooks cut ramp time by 25-40% using recorded workflows and deal-stage templates.

mappings.pain_point: Small ecommerce teams struggle to run personalized campaigns across channels without heavy manual effort.
mappings.value_proposition: Marketing Hub automates segmentation and multi-channel campaigns, increasing email conversion rates by up to 25% while saving 10+ hours/week.

mappings.pain_point: Commerce and marketing data are disconnected, so purchase behavior isn’t used to personalize site or email.
mappings.value_proposition: Commerce Hub connects order and product data to Marketing Hub, enabling personalized cart and post-purchase journeys that lift AOV by 10-18%.

mappings.pain_point: Content creation for product pages and landing pages is slow and inconsistent across markets.
mappings.value_proposition: Content Hub streamlines page templates and localization workflows, cutting time-to-publish by 50% and improving SEO-driven traffic.

mappings.pain_point: Limited analytics make it hard to attribute ad spend to revenue across channels.
mappings.value_proposition: Data Hub consolidates attribution and campaign metrics, improving ROAS visibility and reducing manual reconciliation by 60%.

mappings.pain_point: Small teams can’t sustain 24/7 customer touchpoints to resolve purchase issues quickly.
mappings.value_proposition: Service Hub automates common support flows and knowledge base access, resolving up to 40% of inquiries without agent intervention.

mappings.pain_point: High ticket volumes and fragmented systems delay response times and hurt NPS.
mappings.value_proposition: Service Hub centralizes ticketing and automations to reduce average handle time by up to 30% and improve NPS via faster resolutions.

mappings.pain_point: Customer interactions across channels aren’t unified, causing inconsistent service and lost context.
mappings.value_proposition: Smart CRM provides a 360° customer timeline across channels so agents resolve issues faster and reduce repeat contacts by 20%.

mappings.pain_point: Knowledge management is inconsistent, and agents search multiple systems to answer common queries.
mappings.value_proposition: Content Hub’s knowledge base and content workflows reduce agent search time and deflect tickets, lowering support costs by up to 25%.

mappings.pain_point: Reporting on CX and operations requires manual data stitching across platforms.
mappings.value_proposition: Data Hub automates cross-channel reporting and dashboards, cutting monthly reporting effort by 70% and providing real-time KPIs.

mappings.pain_point: Returns and refunds processes aren’t tied to CRM, hurting customer lifetime value tracking.
mappings.value_proposition: Commerce Hub integrates order and service workflows into Smart CRM, improving resolution speed and recovering revenue opportunities worth 3-6% of sales.

mappings.pain_point: Revenue cycle teams have fragmented patient and billing records across systems, causing claim delays.
mappings.value_proposition: Smart CRM and Data Hub unify patient and billing data, reducing claim processing time by up to 25% and lowering denials.

mappings.pain_point: Patient outreach for billing and pre-authorizations is manual and error-prone.
mappings.value_proposition: Service Hub automates appointment and billing reminders, improving collections and reducing late payments by 15-30%.

mappings.pain_point: Marketing and patient acquisition lack compliance-aware personalization tools.
mappings.value_proposition: Marketing Hub with Content Hub enables compliant, personalized outreach that increases appointment conversion by 10-20% while preserving data governance.

mappings.pain_point: Operational reporting for revenue and clinical throughput takes finance weeks to produce.
mappings.value_proposition: Data Hub delivers consolidated dashboards for finance and clinical ops, cutting report preparation time by 80% and enabling faster operational decisions.

mappings.pain_point: Onboarding new revenue-cycle staff is slow due to disparate processes and training gaps.
mappings.value_proposition: Service Hub’s playbooks and Knowledge Base speed ramping by 30% and improve first-contact resolution for billing inquiries.

mappings.pain_point: Small marketing teams lack bandwidth to produce consistent content and funnels for rapid growth.
mappings.value_proposition: Breeze (AI tools) combined with Content Hub accelerates content creation, cutting production time by 60% and enabling weekly campaign cycles.

mappings.pain_point: Conversion tracking and attribution are immature, wasting ad spend.
mappings.value_proposition: Marketing Hub and Data Hub provide out-of-the-box attribution and dashboards, improving ROAS clarity and reducing wasted ad spend by 15-25%.

mappings.pain_point: Customer handoffs from marketing to sales are inconsistent, losing early-stage deals.
mappings.value_proposition: Smart CRM creates automated lead routing and standardized contact records, increasing conversion of MQLs to SQLs by 10-20%.

mappings.pain_point: Manual A/B testing and landing page updates slow experimentation velocity.
mappings.value_proposition: Content Hub plus Marketing Hub simplifies A/B tests and page edits, doubling experiment throughput and improving conversion lift.

mappings.pain_point: Startups need fast wins but fear complex integrations.
mappings.value_proposition: HubSpot’s integrated product suite enables plug-and-play connections and reduces time-to-value, enabling first measurable lift in 30-60 days.

sequences.name: Sequence - US Mid-market Tech - Revenue Leaders
sequences.objective: Demonstrate how HubSpot reduces manual work and improves forecast accuracy

touches.objective: Introduce lost selling time & centralized CRM
touches.subject_line: Freeing 8-12 hours/month per rep with Smart CRM
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, I noticed {{company}} is scaling its sales org. Many mid-market tech teams I work with lose selling time to manual CRM updates. Smart CRM centralizes deals and can free ~8-12 hours per rep monthly—would you be open to a 20-minute look?
touches.hints: Reference a recent product launch / hiring surge to show relevance.

touches.subject_line: Improve forecast accuracy by ~30%
touches.content_suggestion: Quick note: companies using Sales Hub cut forecast variance by ~30% by automating pipeline hygiene. Thought this might matter as you scale revenue ops—can we connect?
touches.hints: Personalize by mentioning a mutual connection or recent LinkedIn post by target.

touches.objective: Share a short case example and propose next step
touches.subject_line: How a peer trimmed ramp time 30%
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, a peer in SaaS cut ramp time 30% using Sales Hub playbooks plus Smart CRM. If improving ramp and forecasting is on your roadmap, I can share the 30-day plan we used—open to a quick call next week?
touches.hints: Include a one-pager or 2-line client result; tie to their ARR or headcount.

touches.subject_line: Demo: unified pipeline and forecasting
touches.content_suggestion: Following up — would a 20-min demo of Sales Hub + Smart CRM pipeline views help assess forecast improvements for {{company}}?
touches.hints: Reference a competitor or industry benchmark to create urgency.

touches.subject_line: Potential to add 10%+ revenue via workflow automation
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, based on what others achieved, automating pipeline tasks and lead routing often yields net revenue uplift of 8-12%. If that aligns with your targets, I can run a quick ROI sketch for {{company}}—when’s good?
touches.hints: Include a one-slide ROI tailored to estimated deal velocity and rep count.

touches.content_suggestion: Quick call to see if Smart CRM + Sales Hub fit your forecast and ramp goals. Ask: 'Who owns pipeline accuracy, and can we book 20 minutes to share a short ROI plan?'
touches.hints: Call Director Sales Ops or VP Revenue Operations if CRO not reachable; reference email thread.

sequences.name: Sequence - EU SMB Ecommerce - Marketing
sequences.objective: Show how HubSpot drives conversions and connects commerce data

touches.subject_line: Personalized commerce journeys without heavy ops
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, noticed {{company}} runs DTC channels in multiple markets. Commerce Hub + Marketing Hub can personalize post-purchase and cart recovery flows, lifting AOV 10-18% while saving marketing ops time—interested in a quick walkthrough?
touches.hints: Personalize with top-selling category or recent holiday promo they ran.

touches.objective: Share a short success stat and invite connection
touches.subject_line: Lift AOV 10-18% with Commerce Hub
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}} — brands like yours increase average order value using Commerce Hub + Marketing Hub integrations. Would love to share a short example—can we connect?
touches.hints: Mention a local EU merchant or marketplace integration to build rapport.

touches.subject_line: 3 quick tactics to recover abandoned carts
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, three quick tactics Commerce Hub customers use: 1) triggered cart emails 2) personalized product recommendations 3) checkout A/B tests. These lifted conversions 12-20% in trials. Want a short demo showing these on your catalog?
touches.hints: Attach a mini checklist for cart recovery and reference average cart value.

touches.objective: Nudge towards a meeting with a localized case
touches.subject_line: Local ecommerce case study to share
touches.content_suggestion: Following up — I can share an EU merchant case that used Content Hub templates + Commerce Hub to cut time-to-market and boost international conversion. Open to a 20-min call?
touches.hints: Reference GDPR-compliant personalization as a reassurance point.

touches.content_suggestion: Quick call to explore a tailored pilot using Commerce Hub and Marketing Hub. Ask: 'Would a 30-day pilot to test cart recoveries make sense for your Q3 growth plan?'
touches.hints: Call during local business hours; reference previous email tactics and one KPI uplift.

sequences.name: Sequence - US Enterprise Retail - Customer Service
sequences.objective: Position Service Hub + Data Hub to reduce ticket volume and improve CX

touches.objective: Lead with reduced handle time and NPS improvement
touches.subject_line: Cut support handle time 20-30% with Service Hub
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, large retailers we work with reduced average handle time ~25% after centralizing ticketing in Service Hub. With integrated customer timelines via Smart CRM, agents resolve faster and NPS improves—can we schedule 20 minutes to discuss?
touches.hints: Reference a seasonal peak (e.g., returns season) where support volumes spike.

touches.subject_line: Unify customer interactions across channels
touches.content_suggestion: Quick note — Smart CRM gives agents a single timeline across purchases and tickets, reducing repeat contacts by ~20%. Happy to share a short demo.
touches.hints: Praise a recent customer experience initiative they announced or a store expansion.

touches.objective: Share data-driven ROI case and propose pilot
touches.subject_line: Pilot: reduce ticket volume by 40% via KB + automation
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, retailers piloting Content Hub knowledge bases + Service Hub automation deflected up to 40% of tickets. If reducing support headcount pressure is a priority, I can outline a 60-day pilot—interested?
touches.hints: Include an estimated ROI calculation using average ticket costs if available.

touches.subject_line: 60-day pilot to cut ticket volumes?
touches.content_suggestion: Following up — would a short pilot to prove deflection and reporting improvements be useful to your ops team?
touches.hints: Mention specific KPIs like AHT, first-response time, and NPS uplift.

touches.subject_line: Real results: lower costs, faster resolutions
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, to recap: Service Hub + Data Hub drive faster resolutions, reduce costs, and provide real-time dashboards for ops leaders. Can we book 20 minutes to map this to your Q4 goals?
touches.hints: Attach short customer win one-pager and offer 2 time slots.

touches.content_suggestion: Quick call to align stakeholders for a pilot of Service Hub and Content Hub. Ask: 'Who on your team manages KB and automation—can we get them on a 20-min call to scope a pilot?'
touches.hints: Call early morning; reference the ROI one-pager and list proposed stakeholders to invite.

sequences.name: Sequence - Global Mid-market Healthcare - RevCycle
sequences.objective: Show how HubSpot reduces claims delays and automates patient outreach

touches.objective: Introduce unified patient and billing data benefits
touches.subject_line: Reduce claim delays with unified patient data
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, revenue cycle teams often struggle with disconnected records causing claim denials. Smart CRM + Data Hub unifies patient and billing data to cut claim processing time ~25%. Can we discuss your current obstacles for 15 minutes?
touches.hints: Mention privacy/compliance controls and note global/regional requirements.

touches.subject_line: Automate patient billing reminders and boost collections
touches.content_suggestion: Many providers automate billing reminders with Service Hub and improve collections 15-30%. Happy to share a compliance-safe workflow used by peers.
touches.hints: If possible, reference a healthcare conference they attended or a regulatory update in their country.

touches.objective: Detail a compliant pilot and propose next step
touches.subject_line: Compliant pilot: faster claims & better collections
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, we run short pilots that connect claims and patient outreach while preserving data controls. Pilots typically show measurable improvements in 60-90 days. Can we schedule 20 minutes to review a compliant pilot plan?
touches.hints: Include an outline of compliance controls (GDPR, HIPAA where relevant) to reduce risk concerns.

touches.objective: Nudge decision and offer a case
touches.subject_line: Case: 25% faster claim processing
touches.content_suggestion: Following up — happy to share a concise case showing 25% faster claim processing after Data Hub + Smart CRM consolidation. Open to a short call?
touches.hints: Tag clinical operations or finance stakeholders so they see cross-functional relevance.

touches.content_suggestion: Quick call to align stakeholders for a compliant pilot linking Service Hub and Data Hub. Ask: 'Who owns revenue performance and would join a 20-min scoping call next week?'
touches.hints: Call during working hours in their time zone; mention privacy safeguards and pilot timeline.

sequences.name: Sequence - US Startup (50-200) - Growth Marketing
sequences.objective: Show fast wins using Breeze AI + Marketing & Content Hubs

touches.objective: Introduce fast content production with Breeze
touches.subject_line: Cut content time 60% with Breeze + Content Hub
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, growth teams often need faster content to fuel paid and organic channels. Breeze (AI tools) with Content Hub can cut content production time ~60% and enable weekly campaigns—interested in a 15-minute demo?
touches.hints: Personalize by citing a recent blog or product announcement they made.

touches.subject_line: Weekly campaign velocity, zero extra hires
touches.content_suggestion: Small teams we work with doubled experiment velocity using Breeze-generated drafts and Content Hub templates—no extra hires required. Can we connect briefly?
touches.hints: Reference a growth metric like CAC or LTV if visible on their site or job posts.

touches.subject_line: 30-day playbook to speed experiments
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, attached is a 30-day playbook using Breeze + Marketing Hub to run 4 experiments and improve inbound conversions. Would you like a tailored version for {{company}}?
touches.hints: Attach a one-page playbook and suggest two short time slots for a call.

touches.content_suggestion: Quick call to see if a 30-day pilot using Breeze and Content Hub fits your Q/Q growth plan. Ask: 'Who else should we include to scope a pilot—CEO or head of growth?'
touches.hints: Call late morning; reference the attached playbook and a client ROI example.
